summary: When federal agencies implement our recommendations, it leads to billions of dollars in savings annually and thousands of other improvements across government. Among the 122 recommendations we made to the Office of the Director of National Intelligence from FY 2011 to 2025, 44 have yet to be fully implemented. These recommendations are intended to address issues with workforce management, intelligence enterprise management, personnel vetting, and...
title: Status of Open GAO Recommendations to the Director of National Intelligence
